End of Trade
The current ruler of Paris has ended the trade agreement in the Lugdunensis. Already, the merchants and wanderers are packing their bags, and heading elsewhere.

You have ordered a great Quarantine be placed on your realm, in order to prevent the dangers caused by disease. Foreign merchants have been banned, and strict curfews have been placed on all towns and villages. It can only be hoped that this will be enough...
[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] have mercy...
You have decided to lift the Quarantine on the population, and curfews and restrictions have been lifted.
Glorious News!

Your liege has ordered a great Quarantine be placed on the realm, in order to prevent the dangers caused by disease. Foreign merchants have been banned, and strict curfews have been placed on all towns and villages. It can only be hoped that this will be enough...
[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] have mercy...
Your liege has decided to lift the Quarantine on the population, and curfews and restrictions have been lifted.
Glorious News!

As the leader of the Republic, you have instituted a new law, that now forces incoming merchant ships to wait for 40 days before entering the city. Afterwards, the boat will be checked for any signs of plague. This should help to prevent disease from entering the city, and the republic itself.
It is now in [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]'s hands...
You have ordered the Quaranta placed on all trade posts in the Republic be removed. Now ships may enter the ports freely.
Wonderful!
The people of Rome have adapted well to live in the Quarantine. Those showing symptoms have been isolated in the Colosseum, and the guards have kept anarchy to a minimum.
Excellent News!
The Bubonic Plague
There are rumors of a terrible plague spreading in the [From.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName], leaving a trail of desolation in its wake. The pestilence is like nothing ever seen before.
May [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] prevent the pestilence from ever reaching our realm...
[Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap] will protect us!

The pestilence is sweeping through the whole known world and has reached the realm. Symptoms appear to be fever, headaches, vomiting, necrosis of the hands,... Doctors are helpless and very few infected people manage to survive. Farmers can't take care of crops and the price of grain is rising.
[Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap] has abandoned us...

As a religious head, being contaminated by the pestilence will have a profound impact on your authority. In these difficult times the [Root.Religion.GetName] followers were hoping you would provide guidance and hope.
[Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap] has abandoned us...

Rumors are spreading that the [From.GetTitledName] has become plague-stricken. In these difficult times the [From.Religion.GetName] followers were hoping for guidance and hope, and now the moral authority of the religion is weakened.
Certainly the hand of [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName], we are doomed !
A sign that [Root.Religion.GetName] is the true religion !
There are rumors that a terrible plague has reappeared in the [From.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName], leaving a trail of desolation in its wake. The symptoms ressemble the ones of the Great Plague...

The various practitioners of Germanic Paganism have deviated enough due to their isolation that there are enough cultural differences to warrant separate religions. The divide is strongest between the North, West, and Central Germans.
Horrible!
Fools...
A Germanic Schism
The differences between you and your Germanic brothers has warranted divides in the old faith as languages and customs have changed the faith.
Hail Odin!
Hail Woden!
Hail Wodan!
They speak of Odin...
They speak of Woden...
They speak of Wodan...
A powerful warlord has humbly beseeches you to grant him the honor of the Western Empire. Should you agree, a new great power will form loyal to you, but the other patriarchs might be displeased.
I agree!
I disagree!
The Pope has agreed to your request, and now you are to be considered ruler of the restored Empire in the West!
Excellent News!
The Pope has denied your request, claiming you to be unfit for the honor of the Western Empire.
How dare he!
A powerful warlord, [From.GetTitledFirstName], has become quite a powerful ruler. In hopes to legitimize his reign, he has asked if you would grant him the Western Crown.
I'll allow it...
That Fool!
The great Emperor of the East, [From.GetTitledFirstName], has agreed to your request, and has declared you Emperor of the Restored Western Empire.
Excellent News!
The Emperor in the East has denied your request, claiming you unfit to rule the West.
How dare he!

Like the union of Sophia and God, [From.GetTitledFirstName] and [From.GetPossPronoun] [GetFromVsNewRelation] [New.GetTitledFirstName] have formed a sacred union, pleasing to [From.Religion.GetRandomGodName]. We can collect a Royal Aid Duty to pay for the ceremonies.

The great [Root.Religion.GetName] [Root.GetTitledFirstName] has decided to call a Great Holy War against the Monotheists in the [From.GetFullBaseName]. He urges all righteous [Root.Religion.GetName] Believers to take up arms against the depraved [New.GetTitledName] for the glory of the Faith.\n\n [Root.GetTitledFirstName] be praised!
[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] be Praised!

The [Root.Religion.GetName] [Root.GetTitledFirstName] has been troubled with the reports of heathens in [From.GetFullBaseName]. After many restless nights, he now urges all of the [Root.Religion.GetName] Faithful to partake in the righteous war against [New.GetTitledName] for the glory of Faith.\n\n Their foul [New.Religion.GetRandomGodName] will be smote down!

The rumors and fears heard by the great [Root.Religion.GetName] [Root.GetTitledFirstName] have been proven. The people of [From.GetFullBaseName] have strayed from the true doctrine, and have followed false prophets. [Root.GetTitledFirstName] now urges all of the [Root.Religion.GetName] Faithful to stand against the [New.Religion.GetName] menace.\n\n [New.GetTitledName] shall burn!

The glorious [Root.GetTitledFirstName] has troubling news for the [Root.Religion.GetName] Faithful. The lands of [From.GetFullBaseName] are controlled by the foul worshipers of Demons, led by the depraved [New.GetTitledName]. Now, [Root.GetTitledFirstName] urges all to fight against the foul servants of [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]!

Your colleague, the Patriarch of Constantinople, has been a rival and near enemy for many years, but now, his recent acts have gone too far. You have decided to excommunicate the Patriarch, and he has done the same.

The noble and faithful High Priest of the Reformed Semitics is troubled by the presence of heresy and infidelity among the people of the Wide Planet. Now, he has called together his most loyal and trusted soldiers to form the Fist of Hubal. With these great warriors fighting, they shall represent the Golden Fist of Hubal.
The Fist of Hubal
Habul watches over us!
The work of madmen...
My [GetFromRelation], [From.GetTitledFirstName], has requested to join the Fist of Hubal in its tireless pursuit of heathens, even though this will forever disinherit him.

Great [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle], your extremely generous donation will aid us greatly as we ride into battle against the enemies of Hubal! Upon my honor, I shall hold a great sacrifice in your name!

Hubal be Praised!
Warlord [From.GetFirstName]

Most righteous [Root.GetTitledFirstName], the Fist of Hubal is in need of more castles in order to train troops and generate a supporting income. There is a location in you land, known as [FromFrom.GetName], and the omens have proven it to be a sacred spot. I am willing to pay you 100 gold in exchange for the right to construct a fortress there.

Hubal be Praised!
Warlord [From.GetFirstName]
The Fist of Hubal has constructed a castle in [Root.GetName]!

Your majesty, this antagonism is completely unwarranted! The Fist of Hubal's only goal is to expel all forms of blasphemy! The gods will have you destoyed! May you be plagued!

May death find you,

Warlord [From.GetFirstName]

Tensions between the Churches in the east and west have reached a climactic finale, with both the Patriarchs of Rome and Constantinople excommunicating each other, leading to what is now called the Great Schism.

With the death of, [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] the reign of the [FromFrom.GetOnlyDynastyName] family has come an end. You, as the new ruler, have very little legitimacy to the throne, and many believe that the integrity of the throne has been compromised. You can retain the crown and keep the kingdom, but your vassals may claim the throne for themselves.
The Crown is Mine!
Hold Fast!
I shall stand down...
Interregnum

With the end of the old ruling dynasty, the new ruler, [From.GetTitledFirstName], has decided to renounce the Crown, seeing his illegitimacy. Now, all his formal vassals are independent, and you now control your own fate.
An interesting development...
Age of Tyranny!

with the death of the old ruling dynasty, your liege, the tyrant [From.GetTitledFirstName] has tried to claim himself rightful successor. Now, you have as much claim on the kingdom as he does, and this may lead to open war.
How dare he!

The local priests in [Root.GetName] have claimed to have found a Holy Tree, sacred to the mighty [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]. They seek to turn it into a holy site, but they would require a substantial investment on your part.
Anything for the Gods!
It's just a tree...

The Holy Tree in [Root.GetName] has become quite famous among the people, with many making Pilgrimages to see such a holy site. The people praise you for such pious actions, and already sacrifices have been made in the honor of the great [From.GetTitledName].
Excellent!
A tree in the province of [Root.GetName] is called "holy" by the heathen population. As a good ruler of the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith, it is your duty to destroy such an abomination!
Destroy it!
We cannot!

A holy tree in the province of [Root.GetName] has become a center of contention among Reformists and believers of the old faith. Unfortunately, the [Root.GetName] Tree has become a rallying point for anti-reformation propaganda, and many Reformists advise the tree be cut down.
Destroy it!
We cannot!
Perhaps we are wrong...

While patrolling your realm, you have encountered the burned remains of the once famous [Root.GetName] Tree, which was burned in hopes of converting the pagans. Now it is a hollow reminder of an old way....
The [Root.GetName] Tree

The Germanic Pagans have sacrificed [From.GetTitledName] to their gods! After bringing [From.GetHerHim] to one of their sacred groves, their priests placed  a noose around [From.GetFirstName]'s neck and hung him from a ceremonial tree. They then tore out [From.GetHerHis] still beating heart to the cheers of their assembled warriors.
Our glorious priests have sacrificed [From.GetTitledName] to the great gods! His body now hangs in the sacred grove!
Praise the Gods!

A great sacrifice has been ordered, as described in the old traditions of the Alamannians. Countless animals, from cows to dogs have been gathered, beheaded, and hung in a sacred grove. Truly such an act shall appease the great [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName].
Praise the Gods!

Just as Sofia was united with the Savior, [From.GetTitledFirstName] and [New.GetTitledFirstName] have been taken to the Nymphon to be wed. Surrounded by mirrors, the spiritual marriage was performed in the pattern of the higher Syzygia, just as the faithful will form union with their angel in the afterlife. This is a very pious act.
I will confer my favor upon the, for the father of all...
The Realm has converted to your culture and religion
Praise the Gods!
You embrace the Apellian school of theology.

You have decided to embrace the Apellian school of Marcionian theology. As revealed to Apellius through a demon speaking through the woman Philumene, the Apellian school is deeply settled in Gnostic rites.
The Potitian school is the "Orthodox" branch of Marcionism, centered on a fine line between Gnosticism and Christianity.
The Synerian school has forgone many of the Gnostic and heretical elements of this faith, centering itself on a more Nicene approved standpoint.
You embrace the Potitian school of theology.
You embrace the Synerian school of theology.

A horrible tragedy has struck in the East. A massive earthquake has decimated the Oriens, killing thousands. In Alexandria and Damascus, shocks and tremors were even felt. The Jewish communities are already calling this the "Ra'ash shvi'it", or year of the seventh earthquake.
Horrible News!
The Seventh Earthquake

The Celtic Pagans have sacrificed [From.GetTitledName] to their gods! After bringing [From.GetHerHim] to one of their druids, the performed a complex ritual to a specific god before killing [From.GetFirstName].
Our glorious priests have sacrificed [From.GetTitledName] to the great gods! May the gods now look upon us in favor!
Praise the Gods!
Denounce the Three Chapters
After the disastrous Third Chapter controversy, it is now necessary to call a church council. If successful, the Monophysites may be brought back into the fold.
Call the Patriarchs!
The various Patriarchs of the Chalcedonian Church have gathered here to debate the Second Council of Constantinople. You are the deciding vote.
Denounce the Three Chapters!
Rescind the Condemnation
The Second Council of Constantinople
The patriarchs in the East have voted that the Three Chapters shall be condemned, and that Christ had one energy and will. Now, one must wait for the input of the West and the Monophysites.
Interesting...
The Patriarchs have decided to rescind the condemnation placed on the Three Chapters, nullifying the previous edict.
The powers in the East have decreed that the three chapters will be condemned, now you must react accordingly.
I submit.
Heresy!
The Aquileian Schism
Though the Pope has agreed with the demands of the East, many Western priests have decreed the Council heretical. Now, they have cut communication with both Rome and Constantinople.
For Aquileia!
Heretics!
The Patriarchs in Constantinople has announced the Second Council of Constantinople, which aims to restore communion between the Monophysites and Chalcedonians.
We are one in faith.
A vague ploy...
The Monophysite Patriarchs have decided to accept the Second Council of Constantinople, and join the Chalcedonian faith. Now, the world is much closer to finally achieving unity among all Christians.
Glorious News!
Three Chapters Controversy

The Emperor in the East, in an attempt to solve the problems between the Monophysites and Chalcedonians, passed an edict condemning 3 religious works. Unfortunately, the act has already received criticism in the East and West, and there are talks a Second Council to be held in Constantinople.
Ok

The great Barbarian lord [From.GetTitledFirstName] has captured the schismatic Aquileian church. In a power grab, he has been baptised, and declared the First Council of Aquileia, declaring all other Patriarchates as heretical, and defying the authority of the Pentarchy.
The First Council of Aquileia
End of the Schism
The Patriarch of Aquileia has decided to accept the decrees of the Second Council of Constantinople, and rejoin the Church.
Very well.
Interesting...

I trust you are in good health, [Root.GetTitledFirstName]. My name is Halmsaurg, and I have taken it upon myself to create a brotherhood of warriors devoted to Loki. While sailing along the coast of Trondelag, I discovered the perfect site to build our stronghold and I would ask your permission to settle this land.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
I don't want you barbarians in my land!
By all means, build your castle.

The Vikings under Halmsaurg have finished their stronghold in [Root.Location.GetName] and the warrior brotherhood have established it as their headquarters. Henceforth the new castle shall be known as Lokshaldenth.
So be it.
The Messengers of Loki

A band of fierce Vikings have established a warrior brotherhood in [From.Location.GetName] along the Swedish coast. Based in a castle known as Lokshaldenth, these Messgengers are devoted only to Loki. They brook no quarter on the battlefield and will permit only the strongest and ablest warriors amongst their number.\n\nThough there are those who would dismiss them as simple brigands, the Messengers of Loki have vowed to attack all lands controlled by the infidels from the South.
Praise the Messengers!
Are there no end to the barbarians?
The people of the Principality of Novgorod are forming unique customs and manners, the residents of the principality can now be considered culturally unique.
But what of Russian values?
They are coming around.
The Elitists Triumphant

After centuries of persecution, the Monothelite faith has been restored in favor in the eyes of Christianity. Now, the Monothelite Patriarch has declared the Orthodox faith heretical, ushering a new age of Christianity
Glory to the Elite!
For the Monothelite Patriarch!
For the Pope!
For the Ancestors!
For the Ecumenial Patriarch!

The people of [Root.GetName] have developed their language and customs to a point where they may now be considered part of a distinct branch of Italian culture. They have begun to refer to themselves as Dalmatian.
An interesting development.
Welcome to Dalmatia my brothers and sisters!

The people of [Root.GetName] have developed their language and customs to a point where they may now be considered part of a distinct branch of Frankish culture. They have begun to refer to themselves as Walloon.
An interesting development.
Welcome to Walloonia my brothers and sisters!
Mani Triumphant

The great Kahn has converted to the ways of Manicheanism! The followers of Mani have always had great success amongst the steppe people, and with the Great Khan's conversion, many of the Mongols will follow in his footsteps.

The Great Khan has converted to the Mahdi faith. The Islamic Court Mullah's have held way of his court for many years now, but this decision is surprising. The Kahn insist that the Mahdi has already come, in the form of Gengis Kahn..
The Mahdi among us!
By the Holy Quran

The followers of Mohammad have converted the Kahn! The Kahn, after his conversion, began a study of the hadiths. Declaring them false, the Kahn declared that the Quran is the only legal religious text, burying hundreds of guides to Islamic Law.
The Peacock Angel Ascended

The great Kahn has converted to the way of the Yazid! The highly shamanic traditions and mystical nature has appealed to the great Kahn's followers. Now, he intend to enforce his new belief upon his followers, and plans of a Great Xvaili are being planned in the ruins of Beijing!
Of Zoroaster!

The Great Kahn, after traveling through the Persian highlands, found a small cove of Zoroastrian Priests, inspired by their piety and faith, he decides to stay for a while. When he returned to his fellow soldiers, he began to preach the ways of Zoroaster, and promises to restore the high priesthood!

You have called for a great celebration of Beltane, a festival commemorating the coming of Summer, already the people are preparing for the holiday, with many merchants selling the many decorations and supplies for the festival.
Invitations for the Beltane have been sent.
[From.GetTitledFirstName], your liege, has invited you to join [From.GetHerHim] for this years Beltane festival. This is a time of celebration, commemorating the coming of Lugh, and summer.
Ridiculous!

It is late and your vassals have arrived, already the bonfires have been lit to commemorate the coming of summer. Through the night, food and good cheer will be found. Many of the activities are meant to bring fertility and appease the Sí, who are most active this night.
By the Horned One we pray!
As you arrive the smell of burning wood fills the air, you can already see great commotion going on, and there are dancers and cooks awaiting your needs. This will surely be the greatest Beltane yet!
Praise the Gods!
With a clap of your hands, servants bring out plate after plate of food for the guests, a loud cheer is heard and the festivities continue.
What a fine night!
You see your liege claps his hands, and the servants bring out the awaited food, you give a loud cheer, and proceed with the activities.
Praise Lugh!
You see the first light of dawn as the last of the vassals depart to the keeps. Already it is said that this year is better than the last and well worth the trip.
At the break of dawn, the final fires are going out, and you begin to return to your keep. Already you are claiming that this feast was the best yet.
A fine celebration!
Due to the call of war, you must now lead your men in a new hunt, for there must be blood for Lugh!
The hunt continues!
The celebrations for Lugh have ended, now you must return and guide your people in the harvest of their crops.
Glory to Lugh!
I have called for a celebration of Lughnasadh to be held this year. This is a holiday in honor of the glorious Lugh, and we hall have a hunt to commemorate the beginning of the harvest season.
Praise Lugh!

We are now preparing to hold the Samhainm or All Hallow's Eve, the holy tradition commemorating the beginning of winter. In these last warm days, the merchants are setting up their stalls, and the children are dressing up a monsters. This is a time of feasting and celebration, for at this time the veil of Skathach is thin, allowing spirits to cross over.
Praise the dead god Lugh!

The merchants are closing up their stands and the children returning home, bags filled with food and treats. As Lugh died to the Lord of Misrule, the day grow short, and we prepare for the onslaught of winter.
May we be safe this winter!

Two men suddenly rush into your court, both yelling about a problem. When they calm down, one tells you that the other stole his bronze axe, a powerful sign of wealth. The other claims that he found the axe, so he should keep it.
Give the man his axe!
Well if he found it...
Imprison the thief!
I'll take that!
Make them duel for it!
A terrible drought is in [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]. The crops are wilting, people are starving and lying dead about the streets of the cities. You are preparing a sacrifice to the gods.
How about this mouse?
A fox will surely please them.
An elephant is what our people need!
I'll sacrifice any animal that moves!
The Wendish and Nordic population in the province have developed to the point where they are considered a new culture. Calling themselves the Norvind, they have begun a culturally distinct society.
The Bulgyar and Italian population in the province have developed to the point where they are considered a new culture. Calling themselves the Alzzecio, they have begun a culturally distinct society.
The True Church Rising

After years of persecution and hiding, the Donatist faith has regained enough followers and power to declare the recreation of the Bishopric of Carthage. Now, with the Bishop back in his seat of power, he may properly identify those who are fitting of the Lapsi, and declare a Great Matyr War to expel Heathens, and even worse, the Traditores.
Praise the Church of Saints!
Their pathetic infighting...
The heretics must be defeated!
The Agonisticis

With the Donatist faith once again in control of its holy sites, it has become necessary to re-found the sacred order of the Agonisticis. Known as the Circumcellions by the heretics, this order of Martyrs will defend the faith from those who would put it into jeopardy Already thousands of young men are joining the ranks of the Agonisticis. This is the new golden age of Donatism.
Laudate Deum!
This looks troubling...
You wake up one day and shout, I want to join the Agonisticis
I shall ask
It would not be wise...
My dear liege and lord, I humbly ask you to grant me the right to seek Martyrdom amongst the Agonisticis. Do you accept?
And so the dynasty member joined the Agonisticis
Got turned down!
The people of your Kingdom have developed a blend between the Latin and Frank language, this cultural union is now called Frankish, and it is starting to be widely spoken.
Welcome into the fold, my Frankish brothers and sisters.

The people of [Root.GetName] have developed their language and customs to a point where they may now be considered part of a distinct branch of Latin culture. They have begun to refer to themselves as Romano-Gothic.

The people of [Root.GetName] have developed their language and customs to a point where they may now be considered part of a distinct branch of Frankish culture. They have begun to refer to themselves as Occitan.
Welcome into the fold.
The nerve!
A sum of money was donated to the Agonisticis in order to help arm and trait the recruits.
An ambassador from the Agonisticis arrived in your court today, he seeks permission to build a fortress for the Order in your province in the name of Holy Martyrship.
Of course, anything for the Martyr Army
I would never!
A mighty castle has been erected for the Agonistics.
Fantastic!

I trust you are in good health, [Root.GetTitledFirstName]. My name is Halmsaurg, and I have taken it upon myself to create a brotherhood of warriors devoted to Loki. While sailing along the coast of Trondelag, I discovered the perfect site to build our stronghold and I would ask your permission to settle this land.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
I don't want you barbarians in my land!
By all means, build your castle.

The Vikings under Halmsaurg have finished their stronghold in [Root.Location.GetName] and the warrior brotherhood have established it as their headquarters. Henceforth the new castle shall be known as Lokshaldenth.
So be it.
The Messengers of Loki

A band of fierce Vikings have established a warrior brotherhood in [From.Location.GetName] along the Swedish coast. Based in a castle known as Lokshaldenth, these Messengers are devoted only to Loki. They brook no quarter on the battlefield and will permit only the strongest and ablest warriors amongst their number.\n\nThough there are those who would dismiss them as simple brigands, the Messengers of Loki have vowed to attack all lands controlled by the infidels from the South.
Praise the Messengers!
Are there no end to the barbarians?
The people of the Principality of Novgorod are forming unique customs and manners, the residents of the principality can now be considered culturally unique.
But what of Russian values?
They are coming around.
Syria Restored!

After many years of brutal war, loss of life, and rending of families, the gateway to the East is Restored. Soissons has come far from its holdings in Gaul. Already, the Legions are preparing their tactics and weapons for further conquest in the East.
Laude Rex Syagrius!
Aegyptus Restored!

The people of Soissons are once again Triumphant. After a many brutal sieges, the great Province of Aegyptus has been captured by its true legitimate owners. Now, the Breadbasket of the world will go to feeding the extensive lands of the Roman people.
Cyrenaica Restored!

The cheering of people echo through this barren stretch of land, with the banners of Soissons finally flying over the cities. With this province restored, Soissons is much closer to restoring the empire that is rightfully its own.
Africa Restored!

Finally, Africa has been restored to the claimants of the Western Empire. After its loss to the Vandals in times pass, the people of Soissons proved much stronger than before. Now, the Legions of Soissons are prepared for larger, and more devastating attacks on those who would seek the Empire harm.
Illyricum Restored!
At last, the province of Illyricum has been placed in rightful Roman hands. With the gateway to the East restored, Illyricum is the Easternmost province of the Western Empire.
Italia Restored!

Finally, Italia, and Rome have been restored to the hands of its rightful rulers. After many years of brutal barbarian rule, the seat of Roman power is restored. Already, a Triumph is being held in the Rex's honor, and the legions are training in the Campus Martius.
Gaul Restored!

Soissons has just made its first steps into the old empire, finally restoring the old province of Gaul. Banners and crowds are gathered in Novidunum to cheer on their Rex. Already, the Enemies and Allies of Rome are watching Soissons, as it prepares to launch more ambitious campaigns.
Germania Captured!

At long last, the province of Germania has been added to the Roman's land. Not even the Empire in its prime could accomplish what Soissons had, and at last, the Barbarians have been subjugated. Germania will not be allowed to fall into Barbarian hands again, and the Rex has personally ordered the construction of a statue in his honor in the Province Capital.
Britannia Restored!

Once again, Roman legions are protecting the people of Britannia. With the Saxon invasions, it is clear that the people cannot survive without Roman aid, and a legion has been stationed to protect the Briton's interests. Now, wealthy landowners are purchasing British land and building elaborate estates.
Hispania Restored!

At last, Hispania has been restored to Soissons. After the barbaric Visigoths sacked Rome, they carved their wretched kingdom out of Roman lands. At last, the people have been liberated from the chains, and now cheer for the true owners of Hispania, Rome.
Mauretania Restored!
At long last, the ancient province of Mauretania has been restored to Roman hands. After years of Vandal and Berber rule, the province may now flourish under the benevolence of Roman Rule.
Mesopotamia Restored!
At last, the people of Soissons march through the ancient lands ruled by Babylon. This fertile land will greatly aid the Empire, and help the people to live under proper Roman Law.

The island of Hibernia is the latest addition to the ever-expanding domains of the Roman Empire. This land of gently rolling hills and green fields was never conquered by the old empire, but it should become a pleasant fief to govern if one does not mind the rain or the foul-smelling Celts who inhabit it.
Hibernia Captured
Soissons Triumphant
At last, the Roman Empire's territories are completely restored.

The people of [Root.GetName] have developed their language and customs to a point where they may now be considered part of a distinct branch of Latin culture. They have begun to refer to themselves as Romano-Persian.

The people of [Root.GetName] have developed their language and customs to a point where they may now be considered part of a distinct branch of Germanic culture. They have begun to refer to themselves as Anglo-Saxon.

The people of [Root.GetName] have developed their language and customs to a point where they may now be considered part of a distinct branch of Germanic culture. They have begun to refer to themselves as Kentish.
The calls have been sounded, and the people are packing up their belongings You have declared a mass migration from the old homeland, intent on seeking glory elsewhere.
To new lands we go!
The Great Schism

And emissary came to the Imperial palace with terrible news. The Patriarch of Rome has crowned some Barbarian King Emperor of Rome! Such blasphemy shall not be tolerated, for you war the true Roman Emperor!
Those blasphemous heretics!
The Great Schism

With the Crowning of the Holy Roman Emperor, the divisions between the Patriarch of Rome and the others has been dwindling. Now, both groups can no longer consider each other members one religion. Now you must decide who is right in this theological debate.
For the Orthodoxy!
For the Pope!
Perhaps the Arians were onto something...
The Second Council of Constantinople

An important decision lays upon you today, the Three-Chapter controversy has come to full storm, and the massive growth of Nestorianism is endangering the Patriarchy. Now, a decision must be made. By condemning the Nestorians, and supporting the Monophysite viewpoint, you can bring the Monophysites back into Chalcedonian Christianity, but be careful, the Patriarch of Rome may disapprove...
Denounce the Three-Chapters!
The Second Council of Constantinople

In the Second Council of Constantinople, the Ecumenical Patriarch has decreed support for the Monophysite doctrines, and publicly denounce the Nestorian Three-Chapters. This monumental theological shift may have dangerous consequences once news reaches the Papacy.
An interesting development...
He has no right!
The Second Council of Constantinople

In the Second Council of Constantinople, the Ecumenial Patriarch has attempted to appease both the Nestorian and the Monophysite faiths. Unfortunately, the religious leaders descended into theological fighting. It seems that both sides are no closer to a solution than before.
Pathetic...
Pathetic...
Fantastic!
The Great Schism

When new got to Rome of the Second Council of Constantinople, the Pope was outraged. He publicly denied the theological changes, and demanded the council nullified. In response the Ecumenical Patriarch and the Pope excommunicated each other. Now, it seems the 2 churches are now divided, and each ruler must decide the path to take for their people.
For the Patriarch!
For the Pope!
The Pope Responds
The Pope in Rome has agreed to accept the Changes made in the Second Council of Constantinople. With the joining of the Monophysites, it appears that this has been a success.
Wonderful!

Two men come into your court, shouting and yelling. Upon questioning, they claim to be brothers, and their father had recently died. The eldest claim that their father's breastplate is rightfully his as the eldest, where the youngest says he needs it due to an oath to avenge his father. Though inheritance would pass it to the eldest, Thuringian tribal law states that the breastplate of a family member must pass to the avenger. To give the breastplate to the eldest would make you seem progressive to foreign powers, but the peasants may not be happy.
It must pass to the eldest
The Old Laws are Best.
I'll Compensate the Older Brother
We'll find a compromise!
That looks valuable..
Hold a Duel!

A man was taken to your court today, accused of stealing. According to Thuringian Tribal law, this man must be tried as a murderer. To execute this man would appease the population of your land, but many educated residents of the cities might disprove.
Send him to Prison
Have him Killed!
Let him go.
We shall cut off his hand!
I would be willing to accept a bribe...
He shall be made a slave!

A woman was brought into your court in chains. The guards claim that she was captured trying to marry without the permission of her father. The punishment for such an act is severe, but Thuringian Law dictates that it must be so.
Let the poor woman be.
She must be punished!
I shall bless this marriage.
She does not even wear a veil!
She shall fit nicely with my concubines.

You have recently been given a horse by one of you many Hunnic subjects. This is a sign of close relations formed by the Huns and Thuringians in times past. Along with his horse, the man also offers you his daughter. She is highly skilled, but of low birth. Many nobles would complain to the inclusion of a Hunnic lowborn to the Thuringian Court.
Your gifts are welcome in my Court
Get out of my Court!
It all happened so quickly I barely registered the events. A noble had been kidnapped by a Thuringian Peasant!
column3: Tout a été si vite que je n?ai pas eu le temps de réaliser ce qui se passait. Un(e) noble a été attaqué(e) et enlevé(e) !
column4: Es geschah alles so schnell, dass ich es kaum mitbekam. Ein Adliger wurde angegriffen, und die Entführer zerrten ihn von uns weg!
column6: Todo ocurrió tan rápido que apenas recordaba los hechos. ¡Los secuestradores raptaron a un noble!

column2: I'll save you!
column3: Je vous sauverai !

column2: The kidnappers overpowered me and made sure I could not call for help by stuffing a filthy rag into my mouth! Luckily, they did not get far away with me, [From.GetTitledFirstName] and the guards managed to free me and capture them.
column3: Les ravisseurs m?ont immobilisé(e) et bâillonné(e) avec un chiffon sale pour m?empêcher d?appeler à l?aide ! Heureusement pour moi, ils ne m?ont pas emmené(e) bien loin. [From.GetTitledFirstName] et les gardes ont réussi à me libérer et à les capturer.
column4: Die Entführer überwältigten mich und verhinderten meine Hilfeschreie mit einem dreckigen Lappen, den sie in meinen Mund stopften! Glücklicherweise kamen sie mit mir nicht weit, denn [From.GetTitledFirstName] und die Wachen konnten mich befreien und sie schnappen.
column6: ¡Los raptores me sometieron y me metieron un trapo mugriento en la boca para que no pudiera pedir ayuda! Por suerte no me llevaron muy lejos, [From.GetTitledFirstName] y los guardias lograron liberarme y capturarles.

column2: Make sure they are severely punished!
column3: Veillez à ce qu?ils soient sévèrement punis !
column4: Lasst sie bloß nicht mit zu milden Strafen davonkommen!

column2: [From.GetTitledFirstName] was subject to an attempted kidnapping today and [From.GetSheHe] is clearly shocked by the experience. Now you are put in the decision of their punishment. According to tribal Thuringian law, a kidnapper must be treated as a murderer.
column3: [From.GetTitledFirstName] est sous le choc de la tentative d?enlèvement dont [From.GetSheHe] a aujourd?hui fait l?objet.
column4: [From.GetTitledFirstName] wurde heute Opfer eines Entführungsversuchs, und [From.GetSheHe] ist offensichtlich von dem Erlebnis geschockt.
column6: [From.GetTitledFirstName] sufrió hoy un intento de secuestro y le ha afectado mucho la experiencia.

column2: That's ludicrous, send him to the dungeons.
Have him executed immediately!
Let him go.
He shall be tried by Sharia Law!
I shall charge him a fine.
He shall be tried by a council of Priests!

Two Frisians were brought into court today, but a problem was found. Frisian Tribal Law is different for West and East Frisians. To enforce the same law to all Frisians would certainly be more effective, but the people may not like their traditions being imperiled. Your Court Priest is also pointing out that Trial by Ordeal exists in Frisian law.
Enforce a single Set of Laws!
They have a right to their laws!
Trick them into thinking we are using both laws.
Fine the men for wasting my time!
We shall have trial by ordeal!

A man has accused another man of stealing his property. Frisian law contains a comprehensive list of wergelds, and holds the division of the four legal classes. To support the classes will appease many traditionalists, but a progressive leader would try to end such divisions.
They shall be tried as equals.
They shall be tried and fined according to law!
We'll have a duel!
Collect the Wergeld for yourself.
The Noble is of higher class, so he is correct!

Two arguing parties were brought to court today, a married couple. The man accuses the woman of infidelity and demands that he have the right to punish her. Frisian law is progressive in the equal trial of women, but the men of your country may not approve.
Frisian Law is Supreme!
The Man rules the Woman!
The Man shall pay for the right!
I shall see to a compromise.
I Say Women are Equal with Men!
A clergyman was brought into court today, accused of stealing. Frisian law excludes the clergy from punishment, so to put this man on trial would anger the people.
Put him on trial!
Let Him Go...
We shall create a council of priests to handle this!
Accept some church relics.
The clergy is infallible! Arrest the man who accused the priest!

A Noble has been accused of theft in your realm. As tribal law dictates, he has arrived with the five oath-takers needed for his release. It is obvious that these are paid men, but to put the noble on trial would violate his rights.
Actually, there is a punishment for false witnesses!
Take the Wergeld for Yourself.
Try the freedman as a false testifier!

A man has been brought to your court today, on the charge of murdering a woman. The man confesses to the crime, and according to punishment, he must pay 80 solidi as compensation to her husband. The Husband demands execution, but to kill him would be a violation of Alamannian law.
Have him killed!
The old law is supreme!
Have the two men duel!
Take the payment for yourself.
The traditional law would only charge him 12 solidi...

In a chase, a mob has chased a band of killers into a church. The mod demands their blood, but to do so would violate church asylum, a part of Alamannian tribal law. If you were to let the mod in, the priests would be displeased, and a hefty fine must be paid.
Let the mob in!
Don't let them in!
Burn the Church Down!
Bribe the Priests for the Men.
Demand the mob pay the priests!

The various Goviae that rule a region in your land provide little for the nation. They are a drain on resources, and often do not cooperate with you. To revoke their privileges would would be a progressive move, but the people are quite fond of their tribal Goviae, which have been a center of Alamannian culture since the earliest days.
Unland Them!
They are a symbol of our culture!
Trick them with gifts and false promises.
Collect a Tithe from their estates.
They should be given more power!

There is a large population of non-Arian Christians living in your realm, and conversion attempts have been so far unsuccessful. To accept their presence would greatly appease their communities, but the rest of the population might not agree.
Tolerate their Presence
Drive them out!
Burn them at the Stake!
Collect a Massive Tax

A prophet has distinguished himself in Mecca today, preaching of a strange new faith. Rejecting mainstream Christian views, and adding many elements of Arabic paganism, he has gained many followers. To endorse such a man would involve your conversion, and many nobles are asking for his exile.
You have been exiled from Mecca by its ruler, this will not be taken lightly.
With your exile, you must now lead your men to glory and honor!
We head to Oman!
We shall rule from the Holy City!
Into Africa!
We march to Medina!
With the isolation of the Britons, the inhabitants of the rough terrain of Wales have developed far enough to be considered their own culture. They now refer to themselves as Welsh.
The Slavic populations of Dalmatia have begun to develop their own unique language, now called Croatians, they are a unique entity from previous Slavic Cultures.
The East African residents of you nations have adopted Greek culture and customs in a unique way, and have begun to refer to themselves as the Grecco-Axumites.
I shall join in...
Some of your fellow Senators have been partaking in some, unique activities. Often times the sounds of Women and Wine can be heard throughout the city during one you fellow senator's parties.
I shall focus on my work.
The Plebeians of Rome have been hungry with the loss of much of the grain imports to the city. To feed them all would be expensive, but it would make the people happy.
I shall feed the Plebs.
They money is better spent elsewhere.
You cannot handle these people, it's as if the Senate was made of fools!
I can't take it!
Forgive and Forget...
The entire Senate was quiet after you won argument after argument, maneuvering the political stage like the arenas of old.
Why of Course.
I'm just a man.
The Empire of the Mediterranean

In an incredible display of strength and cunning, the entire Mediterranean world kneels to you as ruler. Much like Rome before you, the Mare Nostrum is now your personal Lake. Many now regard you as the successor of the Old Empire.
Glorious!
The Empire of the Mediterranean

In a miraculous display of skill, the entire Mediterranean world is now united under A single banner. This marks the creation of a nation unseen since days of old. Hopefully now prosperity can last in the new world order.
Is it really true?
Impostors! Usurpers!

The First Temple, built by King Solomon, was destroyed by the invading Babylonians. The Second Temple, built under the auspices of Cyrus the Great of Persia, was razed by the Romans after a terrible siege. The Third Temple, however, built by the great [Root.GetTitledFirstName], shall stand for all eternity!\n\nFrom its position on Temple Mount, the magnificent building has become a dominant feature of Jerusalem, instantly recognizable from far away by travellers approaching the city. Truly, Solomon himself would have been moved to tears by the sight.
column3: Le Premier temple, construit par le roi Salomon, fut détruit par les envahisseurs babyloniens. Le Second Temple, construit sous les auspices du grand Cyrus de Perse, fut rasé par les Romains au terme d'un épouvantable siège. Le Troisième temple, cependant, construit par l'illustre [Root.GetTitledFirstName], se dressera pour l'éternité !\n\nConstruit au sommet du mont du Temple, le magnifique édifice est devenu un trait dominant de Jérusalem et les voyageurs qui arrivent de très loin le reconnaissent instantanément à leur approche. En vérité, Salomon lui-même aurait versé des larmes d'émotion en le voyant.
column4: Der erste, von König Salomon errichtete Tempel, wurde von den babylonischen Eoberern zerstört. Der Zweite, unter der Herrschaft des Perserkönigs Cyrus dem Großen gebaute Tempel wurde nach schrecklicher Belagerung von den Römern geschleift. Der Dritte Tempel aber, geschaffen von [Root.GetTitledFirstName] dem Großen, wird in alle Ewigkeit stehen!\n\nDas prächtige Bauwerk auf dem Tempelberg überragt Jersualem und ist schon aus weiter Ferne sichtbar. Selbst König Salomo wäre von seinem Anblick zu Tränen gerührt.
column6: El Primer Templo, construido por el rey Salomón, fue destruido por los invasores babilonios. El Segundo Templo, erigido bajo los auspicios de Ciro el Grande de Persia, fue arrasado por los romanos tras un terrible asedio. El Tercer Templo, sin embargo, edificado por el gran [Root.GetTitledFirstName], ¡perdurará por toda la eternidad!\n\nDesde su posición en lo alto del Monte del Templo, este magnífico edificio se ha convertido en una insignia destacada de Jerusalén que los viajeros identifican de inmediato al acercarse a la ciudad. A decir verdad, contemplarlo habría hacho saltar las lágrimas al mismísimo Salomón.

column2: It is beautiful.
column3: Il est magnifique.
column4: Der erste, von König Salomon errichtete Tempel, wurde von den babylonischen Eoberern zerstört. Der Zweite, unter der Herrschaft des Perserkönigs Cyrus dem Großen gebaute Tempel wurde nach schrecklicher Belagerung von den Römern geschleift. Der Dritte Tempel aber, geschaffen von [Root.GetTitledFirstName] dem Großen, wird in alle Ewigkeit stehen!\n\nDas prächtige Bauwerk auf dem Tempelberg überragt Jersualem und ist schon aus weiter Ferne sichtbar. Selbst König Salomo wäre von seinem Anblick zu Tränen gerührt.

column2: Some of Persia's finest warriors have taken it upon themselves to found a new holy order dedicated to safeguarding the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith. They call themselves the Immortals, just like the ancient Persian warrior elite described by Herodotus, and they seem intent on carrying on the martial traditions of their legendary predecessors.\n\nThis militant holy order has sworn to fight against all who would threaten the legacy of Zoroaster, and to never again allow Zoroastrianism to suffer again at the hands of infidels.
column3: Certains parmi les meilleurs guerriers de Perse ont pris la décision de fonder un nouvel ordre dédié à protéger la foi [Root.Religion.GetName]. Ils se font appeler les Immortels, comme ces guerriers d'élite perses de l'ancien temps décrits par Hérodote, et ils semblent avoir l'intention de porter la tradition martiale de leurs légendaires prédécesseurs.\n\nCet ordre militant a juré de combattre tous ceux qui menacent l'héritage de Zoroastre et de faire le nécessaire pour que le foi [Root.Religion.GetName] ne souffre plus jamais les maux qu'il a connus lors de la conquête arabe du VIIe siècle.
column4: Einige von Persiens besten Kriegern haben es auf sich genommen, einen neuen Heiligen Orden zum Schutz des [Root.Religion.GetName] Glaubens zu gründen. Sie nennen sich selbst Die Unsterblichen, wie die alte, von Herodot beschriebene persische Kriegerelite, und sie wollen die martialischen Traditionen ihrer legendären Vorläufer wieder aufleben lassen.\n\nDieser militante Heilige Orden hat sich dem Kampf gegen alle verschrieben, die das Erbe Zoroastrers bedrohen könnten, damit der Zorastrianismus nie mehr Rückschläge wie nach den arabischen Eroberungen im 7. Jahrhundert erleiden muss.
column6: Unos de los mejores guerreros de Persia han asumido la tarea de fundar una nueva orden santa dedicada a salvaguardar la fé [Root.Religion.GetName]. Se hacen llamar los Inmortales, al igual que la antigua élite guerrera persa descrita por Herodoto, y parecen decididos a continuar con la tradición marcial de sus legendarios predecesores.\n\nEsta orden santa militante ha jurado luchar contra todos los que amenacen el legado de Zoroastro y no permitir que la fé [Root.Religion.GetName] vuelva a sufrir los reveses causados por las conquistas árabes del siglo VII.

column2: The people of Leon have developed to the point where they are considered a new culture. Calling themselves the Leonese, they have begun a culturally distinct society.
The Georgian Church

Talks between the Patriarchs of many christian churches has led to a decision. The Georgian Church will be joining in communion with either the Nicene or Armenian church. As a ruler, it is your decision to decide which faith you will join.
We shall join the main faith
Glory to the Armenian Church!
We shall remain true!

The hordes of Germanic invaders have finally breached the mighty fortress of Deva Victrix. This town, built by the Legio II Adiotrix, was much larger than any other Roman city in Britannia. Originally intended to be the center of the invasion of Ireland, this fortress then was planned to be the capital of Britannia. With the removal of the legions, the Britons continued to uphold this ancient city. Now, the invaders are referring to this land as Legacaestir, or City of the Legions. It seems that the fall of the Britons is inevitable.
A Black Day!
Wondrous Fate!
While sailing with your men, you have encountered a great storm. Many are in despair, and they look to you for safety.
Save yourself!
Take control of the situation!
A villager has come to your court, claiming that he saw a magical creature in the woods. Surely such creatures don't actually exist?
Bah! Fairy Tales...
This is incredible! Tell me more...
Of course they are real!
The people of your realm are restless, claiming that the Sun God has shown disfavor upon the people. A sacrifice, though costly, would go far to appeasing the people.
Proceed with the Sacrifice!
It is too expensive!
The priests of the realm would like to grant you the title of Imazunen for your great piety and faithfulness to the gods.
I am honored...

Your realm's economy is in a state of chaos, but many of the elder tribesmen believe they have a solution. In the old days, all transactions were barter based, and should you refute the value of currency, you could annul all debts. Of course, this action will further cripple your economy and plunge the realm into a state of Tamtruyt.
We shall pay our debts in full!
Restore the Barter Economy!
A skilled Syrian diplomat has arrived in your court. Educated in the finest schools of Antioch and Edessa, he is willing to use his skills for the betterment of your realm.
Interesting...
A skilled Syrian administrator has arrived in your court, knowledgeable in all manners of taxation and bureaucracy. He is willing to use his skills for the betterment of your realm.

An elusive Syrian spy has found his way to your court. Wanted for countless crimes in the West, his reputation for intrigue and subterfuge is legendary, and he now seeks to use his skills for the betterment of your realm.

A member of the Chistian Nasrani caste has arrived in your court today. Known as a Panikkar, he is highly skilled in all manners of combat and tactics, and seeks to aid in the betterment of your realm.

A member of the Christian Nasrani caste has arrived in your court today. Known as a Tharakan, he is a master of all manners of administration in your realm, and eagerly seeks to use his skills under your service.

The realm has benefited from the vast network of contacts that [From.GetTitledName], your Nestorian [Root.GetChancellorName], has fostered abroad. [From.GetSheHe] has managed to turn your realm into a center of Nestorian learning, with countless scholars debating and researching in the new institutions founded by [From.GetTitledName].

[From.GetTitledName], your [Root.GetTreasurerName], has used his talents, and influence in the Nestorian church to provide new and accurate reports on trade and economy in the realm. Understandably, this has been a great boon to the development of the realm's economy.
Fantastic!

Your [Root.GetSpymasterName], [From.GetTitledName], has not fled to your court empty-handed Stashed inside his clothing were many documents with military tactics and technology from across the world. Now, after learning your language, he has been able to give merely a sliver of the advancements he could bring your realm.
I will go to Durovernum Cantiacorum
The angel Gabriel has given me a great vision! I now see the true ways!
The Prophet
The last Prophet of God in the Islam Faith
My faith, the faith of Islam is gaining many followers. I should speak to the ruler of this land so that I may find a home for my people.
The Prophet of Islam would speak to you, seeking to find a land for his "Muslims". You could grant him a plot of land to live in, try to arrest the heretic or even convert to his faith!
Teach me of this "Islam"
Grant him a plot of land
Arrest the fool! I will have none of this.
Muslims from all across Arabia are coming under our banner, praise god!
We have forged an empire of Islam! It was a hard battle and many were lost. Many new Muslim converts from our new rich lands have joined our cause to replenish the ranks! Praise god!
The issue of inheritance is becoming a larger issue then we expected. While most of the realm seems to agree with our decision there are a a few of us that believe otherwise.
Controls Hainaut and Verdun
Assyria Reborn

We thought they were just stories and fables, long buried beneath the sands of the desert. It seems that gods tool of destruction has resurfaced itself once again with the news that a Assyrian king has managed to proclaim his own realm once more.
[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] help us!
As time passes the ideas and traditions of the old Roman Empire are fading away among our Roman subjects
Fantastic!
My family lineage is steeped with Hellenic traditions and I cant help but feel as if I should abandon the faith of the cross for them. What has Christ ever done for me anyway?
Welcome the traditions of Greece into my heart
My lord would never accept it

A proud steward that has arrived at our court claims heritage from the old realm of Carthage, while these claims are dubious at best he does seem to be able to speak a foreign language that is unknown in our court.
A most interesting person

My family has and always will be Celtic, even so, I cant help but feel that this worship of the Jewish God of the east is abandoning the work my forefathers have done in protecting this land, what would Brennus think of my actions?
I say damn the Christian God!
My lord would never accept it

The City of Rome has fallen to the barbarian hordes, we in the east must find some way to supplant those barbaric invaders from their unjust throne. Perhaps we should contact our old Foedarati the Ostrogoths and see if they are willing to help us?
Pay the Ostrogoths a visit
I can conquer Rome myself!
A emissary from the Byzantines has arrived with carts full of gold, food and weapons. Promising us the full riches of Rome if we were to rally our men against the barbarians that have taken Rome.
Sign me up!
I don't feel up to war, have them send it back
After moving into the Indus Valley area a majority of our people have begun adopting Hindu culture and customs, perhaps we should follow along as well?
I guess I should follow along
I heard some interesting things about the Kalash people...
Damn them, I will never forsake the sky god!
Living so far away from our home has caused some of our people to forget the ways of our homeland, as the thrills of migration wane it is time we finally make a choice for the future of our realm
The Nicene faith sounds interesting enough..
Maybe I can still worship some of my old gods but follow along with Christendom?
I saw some old pagan worshipers out in the forest, perhaps I will see what they are up to
I will preserve the Germanic spirit no matter what

Our lack of a proper hair has proven unsettling to some of the nobles of the Realm, luckily a young lad named Justin from a village north of Constantinople has shown a extraordinary amount of promise. We could adopt the boy if we so wished
He is now a member of the family!
You cant help but feel that there is something wrong with the notion of the Christian god, perhaps your forefathers in Illyria were right all along?
I wonder if their gods will forgive me for following the heathen
My lord would never accept it
One of the local hunting parties has discovered a massive Roman aqueduct hidden among the foliage, long abandoned by its masters to rot, it sits as a shrine to their craftsmanship and ingenuity
Leave it along so that generations in the future may remember them
See if we can figure out how to build our own
Break it down and sell off the stone
Leave it alone

Its hard to ignore the legacy of the ancient Romans, from how they administered their land with their great code of laws to how they defeated the mighty Carthaigans, Greeks, Gauls and Persians with their advanced military strategy. Perhaps we may learn something from their legacy?
Perhaps I should try to improve my Latin
Rome is overrated
My guardian keeps on talking about some weird place called "Rome" in such high esteem, perhaps I should ask him about it?
I will ask him what Rome is like
...It also might be pretty boring
Your ward has asked you to tell him about Rome
Rome is a silly place
Well it all started with Romulus and his brother Remus...
Rome has fallen

The city of Rome has finally fallen to the onslaught of the Germanic invaders, the ancient city reduced to rubble. While this might not be the end of the Roman state it will be nearly impossible to preserve its true integrity without the spiritual center of the world. Today marks the end of one thousand years of Roman domination across the western world.
A Potential Ally?

With the rise of the Gokturk Khaganate in the east the local Avar tribes have become displaced, we have received word from a emissary from one of these tribes saying that they would promise to crush our enemies to the north such as the Gepids if we were to supply them with gold and arms. While is is unknown if we can really trust these Avars we could certainly use a tool to unwedge our enemies to the north
Give them the money
Never!
The Avars will invade your enemies to the north with a great army in the next month
Interesting
Odin gives us strength!
God help us!
The Romans deserved everything I have done to them
Odoacer could have never done it without my help
I must preserve the glory of Rome at all costs!
Rome lives on! They are fools to think otherwise
Fall of Persia

The ancient Persian empire has finally perished after nearly one thousand years of rule over the Iranian plateau. From the ancient Achaemenid Empire to the glorious Sassanids the Persians have ruled over one of the richest and most glorious empires the world has ever seen. Now it seems if nothing is done those will all only be memories
Interesting
It seems we have finally won after all
Oh no!
This is not the end! I will restore the Persian legacy!
All of that land, ripe for the taking..
[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] protect us!
Constantinople Falls

The empire of the east has fallen with the fall of the city of Constantinople. The ancient lands of Anatolia, Greece and Egypt were once home to the greatest civilizations of the world. It seems if nothing is done those will only be stories and fables as foreign invaders inevitably stretch their influence into the former bread basket of the Roman Empire.
Oh dear
A heir to the Imperial Legacy?

With the collapse of the Empire in the north we have managed to luckily stay mostly unscathed, the great stability and peace in our realm has caused many to believe that we are the true heirs of the Roman Empire. It is time we bring peace to the rest of the former empire, retake our lost lands and restore the Imperial throne!
We are true Romans!
Sack of Rome
Following the Vandal Sack of Rome in 455 we took countless Roman citizens with us back to Africa to sell off in the lucrative slave markets.
I wonder if the families are still missing their loved ones, haha!
We gain a large group of Roman prisoners to do with as we please
I will ask them what Rome was like
They seem to like Rome just as you do!

A group of Slavs have begun settling in $PROVINCENAME$, while normally we could ignore the politics of the peasant rabble they have been gradually increasing their number to the point where they will outnumber the local population there! The Slavs are incredibly independent and it will be impossible to govern $PROVINCENAME$ unless we take action!
[Root.Culture.GetName] tribesmen have managed to settle into one of our realm provinces, displacing the local populace
Let the Slavs settle there, I never liked $PROVINCENAME$ anyway.
Drive the Slavs off our land!
Rome is the best!
I want to be just like Augustus!
This is very traumatic for you...
The old Slavic ways are giving in and a new culture is forming, people are now identifying themselves as Russians!

We Franks have been surrounded with various religions and faiths, converting to Arianism will ally ourselves with the Arian Goths and converting to the Nicene church will ally ourselves with the eastern Roman empire! We could always remain pagans of course.
While Italia may have fallen, the Eastern Empire still considers us the rightful heir of the imperial throne! Rome lives another day!
Eh, A Slav is a Slav
We will not give in to the new ways!
I like these people.
Convert to the Chalcedonian Church
Convert to Arianism
Remain a pagan
Slavs have settled into one of our realm provinces, displacing the local population
Our liege has decided to let Slavs settle into one of our provinces, there is little we can do about this
Populace embraces your culture.
column3: Populace embraces your culture.

column2: The locals, whose vulgarate has changed so much from its classical roots, have begun to call themselves by the name of their conquerors--"Franc." The Romano-Gauls of Francia are becoming Frenchmans.
Pah! The peasants no longer want to be "Roman..." how fitting.
Honhonhon! À mon avis, le français est la langue supérieure!
The language and customs of the local Romano-Gauls have deviated enough from their classical roots such that they can no longer be called "Roman."
What the peasants do is of no interest to me.
Peasants embracing civilization? Who would've thought...

The Visigoths of the Garonne valley, who have been rapidly Romanized in the past centuries, no longer maintain a position as the dominant class under foreign rule. With no differences in social and political class separating them from their fellow latin-speaking ilk, the Visigoths of Gaul are beginning to melt into the rest of the Romano-Gallic population.
Good riddance. These lands will never be theirs again.
Even the peasants feel the pull of Roman civilization.

With the Visigoths embracing the Nicene faith, the remaining minor differences between the Gothic ruling social class and the Hispani peasants and nobles are fading away. Both groups are starting to consider themselves one-and-the-same in this province, where they have embraced a united identity as the gens of the Rex Gothorum.
Let us embrace the unifying cultural identity!
NO. We will never merge with these peasants in name or custom...
With native Celt-iberian rule long gone, the remaining Celts are starting to assimilate with their Romano-Hispanic neighbors, adopting their tongue and customs.
And the tongue spoken by the peasants concerns me how, herald?
With native Celtic rule long gone, the remaining Gauls are starting to assimilate with their Romano-Gallic neighbors, adopting their tongue and customs.
...And these peasant matters concern me how, again?
The latin vulgarate and customs of the peasants of this province have diverged enough from those of their distant neighbors. This province has become Catalan.
Good.
An interesting development...
The latin vulgarate and customs of the peasants of this province have diverged enough from those of their distant neighbors. This province has become Portuguese.
An interesting development...
Good.
The latin vulgarate and customs of the peasants of this province have diverged enough from those of their distant neighbors. This province has become Castillian.
Good.
An interesting development...
The latin vulgarate and customs of the peasants of this province have diverged enough from those of their distant neighbors. This province has become Leonese.
Good.
An interesting development...

With their subjugation at the hands of the Arabs, the Romantic peoples of Spain are quickly being to influence and be influenced by their new-found rulers. A new Andalusian culture has become to emerge in this province.
The best aspects of both!
Intriguing...

With many years having past since the fall of Rome in the West, the people of Italy have moved away from identifying solely with their Roman heritage much as their dialect of latin vulgarate has moved from its classical forebear. The people of Italy are becoming Italian.
Peasant matters are still peasant matters...
It is good to see the peasants embracing the times.
The Picts of Scotland have slowly been gaelicized under Irish rule, with a new culture identity uniting the Gaels and Picts of Caledonia. The people of this province have become Scottish.
An interesting development!
I'm starting to take to their strange ways too...

Although the Armoricans have long held cultural ties with the Celts of the isles, the increasing influence of the Briton ruling class and Briton migrants has lead to the emergence of a new, mixed culture in Armorica. The people of this province have become Bretons.
Let us embrace these new ways.
Excellent!
Peasant matters are not worth my time.
Restauration & Réunification Romaine
After the glorious military victory against [From.GetTitledFirstName], soliders start calling your name with the agnomen 'Victor over the [From.Culture.GetName] people'.
All should remember that day !
After the glorious military victory at [Root.Location.GetName], soliders start calling your name with an agnomen to reflect your tactical supremacy in that region.
All should remember that day !
Last Roman Empire
column3: Dernier Empire Romain

column2: As the only legitimate heir to the empire after the fall of the other part that had been created in 395, you may now claim the entirety of the territories the empire once held. This is the first step towards reconquering and reuniting the former Roman Empire!
column3: En tant que le dernier état successeur légitime après la chute de l'autre partie qui avait été crée lors de la division de l'Empire Romain en 395, vous pouvez désormais revendiquer l'ensemble des territoires que l'empire détenait à cette date. Ceci est pour vous est la première étape vers une reconquête et réunification de l'ancien Empire Romain!

column2: Long live Rome!
column3: Vive Rome!

column2: You may now use the Imperial Reconquest CB on the entirety of the territory of the Roman Empire in 395
column3: Vous pouvez désormais utiliser le CB de Reconquête Impériale sur l'intégralité du territoire que l'empire Romain contrôlait en 395

column2: Western Roman Empire

As a pwerful ruler of a Roman successor state, you've managed to reclaim the lost provinces in Italia and given back some glory to the city of Rome. You are now seen as the true successor of the Western Roman Emperors. Maybe there is still hope one day to reconquer and reunite the former Roman Empire!
Long live Rome!
column3: Vive Rome!

Restoration of Zeno

Zeno is now once again the emperor in Constantinople. In 475, he had after a conspiracy lost the throne to the Miaphysite Basiliscus and been forced to flee the capital. Subsequently after loosing the throne and being defeated, Basiliscus was imprisoned by Zeno.
Victory of Theodoric

Upon the orders of the Eastern Roman Emperor, you have defeated and overthrown Odoacer, former foederati of the Eastern Roman Empire. With this victory, your people, the Ostrogoths can establish themself in Italy... But some already wonder for how long the cordial relations between you, who can now rule over Italy from Ravenna, and Constantipole will last.
Victory of Theodoric

Upon the orders of the Eastern Roman Emperor, the ambitious barbarian ruler Theodoric Amal has now defeated and overthrown Odoacer, former foederati of the Eastern Roman Empire. With this victory, the Ostrogoths can establish themself in Italy... But some already wonder for how long the cordial relations between Theodoric, who now rules from Ravenna, and Constantipole will last.

The Byzantines are weak and vulnerable to attack after many years of protracted warfare. Many anxious warriors have amassed at Ravenna, anxiously waiting for your command to attack, should you ever give it...
column3: Après plusieurs années de guerre, l'Empire byzantin demeure faible et vulnérable aux attaques. De nombreux guerriers se sont rassemblés à Ravenne, et ils attendent avec impatience vos ordres pour attaquer ces maudits byzantins...

column2: Those Greeks will cower under my might!
column3: Ces Grecs se replieront sous la puissance de mon armée!!

column2: Uh... I'd rather not cause more trouble.
column3: Je ne préfère pas causer plus de problèmes.

column2: Your Grace, we have received disturbing reports that the blasted Totila has amassed a sizeable force of Ostrogoth Barbarians to advance the Gothic cause! What say thou?
column3: Votre Majesté, nous avons reçu des rapports inquiétants que Totila a amassé une force non négligeable de barbares ostrogothes pour promouvoir la cause Gothique! Qu'en dites-vous ?

column2: I'll let my trusted General Narses handle this.
column3: Je vais envoyer mon fidèle général Narsès pour régler ce problème.

column2: This is too much for me to handle, we must sue for peace!
column3: J'en ai assez de cette maudite guerre, nous devrons offrir la paix!

column2: Bugger these petty savages, these rumours are a cruel jape!
column3: Ces rumeurs sont fausses, ignorez-les.

column2: For many years, your dynasty, the Amals, has ruled the great Ostrogothic Kingdom. Being partially Roman in culture has evidently caused much concern and distaste amongst many of your vassals and friends, perhaps you should consider converting cultures?
column3: Pendant de nombreuses années, votre dynastie, les Amal, ont gouverné le puissant royaume des Ostrogoths. Le fait que vous avez partiellement une culture romaine a évidemment causé des tensions entre vous, plusieurs de vos amis et les vassaux. Peut-être que vous pouvez adopter les cotumes ostrogothes pour les appaiser?

column2: To hell with them! I have always been a Roman in spirit and blood.
column3: Je m'en fous! J'ai toujours été un Romain en esprit et en sang

column2: Perhaps it's for the best...
column3: Peut-être que c'est mieux ainsi

column2: The Amal dynasty has reigned in the glorious Ostrogothic realm for many years. Sadly, cultural differences between you and your rightful liege have strained relations significantly. However, a conversion to the Romano-Gothic culture will surely please your suzerain, and may have some hidden benefits to it...
column3: La dynastie Amal a dirigé le glorieux royaume des Ostrogoths pendant de nombreuses années. Malheureusement, des différences culturelles entre vous et votre suzerain rendez les rapports tendus. Cependant, une conversion et adoption de la culture romano-gothique restaurerait peut-être les relations entre vous et votre suzerain, et pourrait peut-être, apporter d'autres avantages...

column2: Well that's just too bad for him. I'm Ostrogothic and proud!
column3: Tant pis pour lui, je suis fier d'être ostrogothe!

column2: I'll do it for the good of the realm!
column3: Je vais le faire pour le bien du royaume!

column2: It has come to your attention that your Visigothic vassals are displeased with your Roman ways. If you are to please them, a conversion to Visigothic would keep peace in the realm.
Never! I cannot adhere to such a barbaric culture!
column3: Jamais! Je ne convertirai pas à une culture si barbare!

column2: It would be wise to please my vassals. Conversion isn't so bad after all.
column3: Ça serait sage d'appaiser mes vassaux. La conversion n'est pas si pire que ça.

column2: Basileus, a letter from the Western Roman Emperor himself details his request to be coronated by Your Grace to solidify his legitimacy amongst Nobles and Peasants alike. It would surely please him to be crowned by the famed Basileus himself.
I'd love to coronate him! Surely such a grand accomplishment should be recognized by such a legend like myself.
To Hell with him! I am the true Roman Emperor and no one is my equal!
